Ooyala Android Pulse Integration API Documentation

The Ooyala Pulse Integration framework for Android allows you to display ads served from Ooyala Pulse along with your video content in the Ooyala Player for Android.

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
com.ooyala.android.pulseintegration
The Ooyala Pulse Integration framework.

The Ooyala Pulse Integration framework for Android allows you to display ads served from Ooyala Pulse along with your video content in the Ooyala Player for Android.

The OoyalaPulseManager class provides the support for displaying Ooyala Pulse ads to your OoyalaPlayer.

Prerequisites

  1. The Ooyala Player framework for Android (aka the Ooyala Mobile SDK for Android)

  2. The Ooyala Pulse framework for Android, version 2.2.x

Getting Started

  1. Import the Ooyala Pulse Integration library

    import com.ooyala.pulse com.ooyala.android.pulseintegration;

  2. Create an OoyalaPulseManager object and associate it with your OoyalaPlayer:

    this.manager = new OoyalaPulseManager(this.ooyalaPlayer);
this.manager.setListener(this);

  3. Implement the OoyalaPulseManager.Listener method 

    @Override
public PulseSession createPulseSession(OoyalaPulseManager ooyalaPulseManager, Video video, String pulseHost, ContentMetadata contentMetadata, RequestSettings requestSettings)
{
  // Set the correct pulse host and options
  Pulse.setPulseHost(pulseHost, nil, nil);

  // Set the width and height to that of the view that will contain the ads.
  requestSettings.width = containerView.getWidth();
  requestSettings.height = containerView.getHeight(); 

  // Implement a way of determining the max bitrate of ads to request.
  requestSettings.setMaxBitRate(BandwidthChecker.getMaxBitRate());

  return Pulse.createSession(contentMetadata, requestSettings);
}

Sample Application

The sample integration is found here.
